name: Home Game - Toronto Loves Basketball
description:
A celebration of the city's passion for basketball and the remarkable stories of legendary players who changed the game. Join us and experience basketball history come to life through augmented reality, where you can custom design your own basketball jersey.

Even before the Toronto Raptors and the rallying cry, "We the North" became a slogan, for over a century, basketball in Toronto was deeply rooted in the evolving social and cultural conditions of our city and its people.  

From the Canadian invention of basketball to the early women's game in 1895, to the first professional basketball game played by the short-lived Toronto Huskies in 1946, and the recent creation of the Toronto Tempo WNBA team, these and many other milestones chart the sport's development in the city.

name: Tao Movement
description:
In our busy world, we often lose touch with the natural rhythms of the universe. Within each of us is ancient wisdom, the language of movement. Just as words express thoughts, our movements speak of our inner state. Through gentle motions, you begin the journey to harmonize your being, letting worldly concerns melt away and embracing unity and inner peace.

 The benefits of Tao Movement are numerous, from transforming pain through gentle movement, increasing flexibility and mobility, harmonizing energy flow and clear stagnation, to experiencing deep peace in body and mind and feeling more vitality, stability, and strength

Everyone is welcome to this in-person session - these simple, gentle movements are easy to learn and transform.

name: Art Fusion Multi Medium Workshop - Give Yourself Flowers
description: Design your own vase of flowers using an exciting mix of materials like fabrics, yarn, foils, and more. In this mixed media workshop, you'll create a textured, layered artwork inspired by various mediums and colours. A vibrant and relaxing experience for all skill levels.

name: Montgomery's Inn Outdoor Farmer's Market
description:
Join us at Montgomery's Inn for our Outdoor Farmers Market Season!

Experience the best of local food, live musical performances, family-friendly activities, and much more at our outdoor market. All are welcome. Outdoor market runs until the end of October.

Launch the Outdoor Market season with us on May 21st - enjoy a live Indigenous Medicine Musical performance by Aqua Music during the Farmer's Market from 2-6pm!

name: Viewmount Park Tree Planting Event
description:
Join us in planting native trees and shrubs at Viewmount Park. Help increase Toronto's urban canopy and biodiversity!

Event site conditions vary. Contact us for more information including accessibility. If you would like to request accessibility support, contact us as soon as possible.

name: Starry Paint Night Workshop
description: Paint like one of the greats at this Van Gogh-inspired paint night. We'll show you step by step how to recreate this piece with the option to pick your own colours and composition. Enjoy a fun yet relaxing creative experience at this paint night designed for beginners and experienced artists alike.
